channel.title: Runescape remake!
channel.description: [size=18pt][u]PLEASE READ![/u] HEY GUYS!! Its me mock, i was wondering if anyone would like to help me create a team to develop a new RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER(REMAKE OF RUNESCAPE) this obviously means you need to know some about java, coding rsps,ect.!!! i am providing everything we need financially out of my own pocket and am willing to give all of donations/membership fee's to STAFF!!! [/size][/size] Please PM me if you would like to join and we can talk more!! [/size]

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

mock pro:

HEY GUYS !! JUST UPDATING YOU ON HOW EVERYTHING IS COMING!! i just dl a blank PI and i thnk im gonna work off that will prob be posting pics of my status tomorrow! has any thought about help me code?? $20-50 depending on how much you work, all work will be logged. and i neeed to start ASAP!!

yep development has just started and already youre steering off in the wrong direction, dont use Project IsShitty…

item.title: Runescape remake!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:14, topic:417829”][quote author=iParty X link=topic=520373.msg3779223#msg3779223 date=1318311594]

It still escapes me why people post in this section as if it were a blog, get some progress going and some media and structure before you even consider making a development thread
[/quote]that’s what I was thinking, but I don’t like to be rude

Sometimes thats what it takes, and when it comes to mopar thats like 90% of the time[/quote]
Yeah hes got a point I mean look at me 95% of my posts are abominable in both grammar and sense, and 99.9% are sarcasm if you haven’t detected it yet in all my posts, and look how successful I am now :trollface:

item.title: Runescape remake!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“mock pro, post:9, topic:417829”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=520373.msg3779195#msg3779195 date=1318310060]

Well, first, stop typing in so big of letters, and loose the blue text, as I said there is over 18 f2p remakes, we don’t need another

[size=24pt]BUT BIG BLUE TEXT IS FUN[/size]

OT
No one would join unless they know you can at least do something… so I suggest starting up and then allowing applications.
[/quote] thats just it i can do something! i can code, i can provide financially, i can make it fun (: and all that we make out of this i am willing to give 100% credits to you guys!! plus all $ donations.[/quote]
Then you need to do something, start it up, show some progress, etc.
And stop posting in different sections, you already posted in the correctish area

Read full topic
